channel.title: [317] Yelling
channel.description: Currently I am using Trinity-Pkz which is working out very well for me except only donators are able to do the ::yell command and even when I have tested with a donator even the donator cant yell. Would anyone know how to fix this?

item.title: [317] Yelling
item.dc:creator: @_Achmed _Achmed_
item.description:
@_Achmed wrote:

[quote=“itai, post:5, topic:328647”]Try this yell, it’s the 1 I added to my project.

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && !muted)
{
String text = command.substring(5);
if((donator==1) && (playerRights<=1)){

Thats pretty cool itai
im gonan use tht
yell("[DONATOR] "+ playerName + “: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}else if(playerRights==0){
yell(”[player] "+ playerName + “: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}else if(playerRights==1){
yell(”[MOD] "+ playerName + “: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}else if(playerRights==2){
yell(”[ADMIN] "+ playerName + “: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
} else if (playerRights == 3 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Co Owner”)) {
yell(”[CO-OWNER] "+ playerName + “: " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
} else if (playerRights == 3 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Out 2 Get Me”)) {
yell(”[OWNER] "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1));
}
}[/code][/quote]

Ima use it

item.title: [317] Yelling
item.dc:creator: @itai itai
item.description:
@itai wrote:

Try this yell, it’s the 1 I added to my project.

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && !muted) { String text = command.substring(5); if((donator==1) && (playerRights<=1)){ yell("[DONATOR] "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }else if(playerRights==0){ yell("[player] "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }else if(playerRights==1){ yell("[MOD] "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }else if(playerRights==2){ yell("[ADMIN] "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } else if (playerRights == 3 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Co Owner")) { yell("[CO-OWNER] "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } else if (playerRights == 3 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Out 2 Get Me")) { yell("[OWNER] "+ playerName + ": " + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); } }

item.title: [317] Yelling
item.dc:creator: @_Achmed _Achmed_
item.description:
@_Achmed wrote:

Just pick one what ever you need

everyone

if (command.startsWith("yell") && playerRights > 0) { String text = command.substring(8); yell("[Player]" + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

Mod

if (command.startsWith("yell") && playerRights > 1) { String text = command.substring(8); yell("[Mod]" + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

Admin

if (command.startsWith("yell") && playerRights > 2) { String text = command.substring(8); yell("[Admin]" + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

Owner

if (command.startsWith("yell") && playerRights > 3) { String text = command.substring(8); yell("[Owner]" + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

Donators

if (command.startsWith("yell") && donator >= 1) { String text = command.substring(8); yell("[Donator]" + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }
